text: Hanki kokankokama nemaniza vahe'mo'zama zamarimpama ohe ahema nehaza zana, zamazeri fru hanige'za fru hu'za manigahaze. Ana nehu'za bainati kazinknozamia rukuta huza mopa rekori azota tro nehu'za, karugru keve zamia ruguta hu'za zafa azankunama nekafriza kazi tro hugahaze. Ana nehu'za hara hu'za zamagra zamagra ohe fri ahe fria osugahaze.
